item.title: BFD and IP redirects
item.description: We faced some strange ICMP redirect messages today on one of our devices after we configured BFD for BGP. Device1 1 2 3 4 5 6 ICMP: bogus redirect from 192.168.100.1 - for 192.168.100.2 use gw 192.168.100.2 gateway address is one of our addresses ICMP: bogus redirect from 192.168.100.1 - for 192.168.100.2 use gw 192.168.100.2 gateway address is one of our addresses ICMP: bogus redirect from 192.168.100.1 - for 192.
